name: Impostor Us
description:
How Do I Play?

You simply press the "RUN" button then go into fullscreen, unless you don't want to, then you just choose a name and play!

Controls

Use the arrow keys to move around, everything else should be simple

Is This Free?

Yes, This is completely free to play in the browser!

What is Impostor Us?

Impostor us is a game made by Triangular Software, it soon will be added to google play!

What is Among Us?

Among Us is an online multiplayer social deduction game developed and published by American game studio Innersloth. It was released on iOS and Android devices in June 2018 and on Windows in November 2018, featuring cross-platform play between these platforms.
